column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The hasty hunter looks at you pleadingly.
Thank goodness you are here. I need your help.
One of the stone guardians in the ruins, it...it attacked our sisters.
I would go and help them, but I fear I cannot do it alone. Please, I beg you─come with me to the Morning Stars.
You came! Thank the gods. There is yet one more to the north, closer to the Great Pyramid.
I will see to this one here. Go and save our sister. When you have her, take her back to Fanow.
I believe I am well enough to walk on my own. Let us hurry back, before another sentinel arrives.
You are returned. Good. All of our hunters are accounted for.
The sentinels have helped guard these ruins for centuries. It is unsettling to know they may now turn on us at any given moment.
Such a thing was inconceivable before the Flood, but as the Light takes its toll they grow increasingly erratic.
Indeed, it has made our duty to these ruins all the more difficult, but we will not be dissuaded from doing what must be done.
It is not much, but I would like you to have this. For helping save my sisters. I pray we can count on your aid should we have need of it again.
